dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Tezdaassesment
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
tezdaassesment
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
We need access to your music library to allow you to play songs directly within the app.
We need access to your camera to take photos for your profile and to upload KYC details.
We need access to your location to provide location-based services and improve app functionality. For example,providing personalized menus or showing location of a chef while a booking is in progress
We need to always know your location to provide continuous location-based services, such as knowing your location for giving real time updates to the host and providing personalised menus
We need access to your location to provide location-based services on older devices.
We need access to your location while the app is in use to show real time location to a host so he is always aware where the chef he booked with is
We need access to your photo library to allow you to upload photos to your profile within the app.
We use user defaults to save your preferences and enhance your app experience.
We access file timestamps to provide timely updates and cache management.
We check disk space to ensure your device has sufficient storage for optimal app performance.
We access system boot time to optimize our services based on your device's uptime.
